value.name: Cleveland police won’t discipline officer who shot and killed Desmond Franklin
value.description: Cleveland police officer Jose Garcia will not be disciplined for fatally shooting 24-year-old Desmond Franklin in April 2020.

value.description: Almost a year ago, at the heart of chants demanding social change and insisting “no justice, no peace,” in Northeast Ohio were young activists making their voices heard while leading the revolution for change.
